Name: SM Nehal Rahman
Review: Being a former local  player and  level b Coach of NCA   I  strongly feel it's not only  important to youngters but also current  first class players because many innovative ideas as well as motivation speeches are shares by experience players and coaches.

Name: Redoy Khan
Review: Reviews in this structure are great because we are forced to have brevity. If players speak first and last because they are leading the review, we only have about 15 seconds to say what you want to say. We better be ready!

Name: Wasiu Shisir
Review: Just to say how happy I have been with the coaching mat, I have tried the mat out on all our different age groups and had total success. All the boys and girls have been enthusiastic about using this new fun piece of kit.
